content.query:
-- CREATE EXTERNAL TABLES AS SELECT (CETAS)
--- We are just transforming table/view to select only the columns we need

USE woca_ldw;

IF OBJECT_ID('silver.Family') IS NOT NULL
    DROP EXTERNAL TABLE silver.Family
GO

CREATE EXTERNAL TABLE silver.Family
    WITH
    (
        DATA_SOURCE = woca_data_src,
        LOCATION = 'silver/Family',
        FILE_FORMAT = parquet_file_format
    )
AS
--SELECT * FROM bronze.vw_Family;
SELECT
    *
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'bronze/Family/*.parquet',
        DATA_SOURCE = 'woca_data_src',
        FORMAT = 'PARQUET'
    ) WITH (
        family_id VARCHAR(50) 64,
        primary_contact VARCHAR(50) 46,
        postcode VARCHAR(15) 9,
        city VARCHAR(50) 32,
        state_code_label VARCHAR(20) 39
    ) AS [family]
GO


 SELECT * FROM silver.Family;
